Fluid Counterattack.name: Fluid Counterattack
Fluid Counterattack.flavor: You become liquid metal and move to the other side of your attacker, striking it before it has time to discover your whereabouts.
Fluid Counterattack.trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against you
Fluid Counterattack.effect: You shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.

Streaking Mercury.name: Streaking Mercury
Streaking Mercury.flavor: Your weapon drips with quicksilver, and you attack the foe in front of you, moving swiftly to the next target, throwing the poisonous metal into its eyes.
Streaking Mercury.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier poison damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage.
Streaking Mercury.effect: You can shift your speed and make a secondary attack.
Streaking Mercury.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Streaking Mercury.onsecondaryHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target cannot see you (save ends).

Mercurial Disguise.name: Mercurial Disguise
Mercurial Disguise.flavor: Your form ripples as if it were water disturbed by a stone, and your appearance changes.
Mercurial Disguise.effect:
You can assume the form of any Medium humanoid, and you disguise your clothing and equipment to reflect this change. You retain your statistics in your new form. The new form lasts until you change form again.
Any creature that attempts to see through your ruse makes an Insight check opposed by your Bluff check, and you gain a +5 bonus to your check.
